goal: Book a one-way flight from SFO to JFK for next Tuesday
user_persona: A busy professional who is direct and values efficiency
initial_prompt: I need to book a flight
stopping_criterias: The user has confirmed the flight booking|The chatbot indicates it cannot fulfill the request

goal: Find the cheapest round-trip flight to Europe in summer
user_persona: A budget-conscious student who asks many questions
initial_prompt: Hi, I'm looking for cheap flights to Europe
stopping_criterias: Flight is booked|User decides not to book|Maximum budget is exceeded

user_persona: A frustrated customer whose plans have changed
initial_prompt: I need to change my flight immediately
stopping_criterias: Reservation is successfully modified|Customer is transferred to agent
